name: Jesus Santander
about: Node | React | .NET Senior Software Engineer. Distributed systems enthusiast
summary: I am a seasoned full-stack web developer with over 7 years of expertise in scalable architectures, distributed computing, cloud infrastructure, and web applications. Proficient in .NET, Node, Azure, and React. Curious, self-motivated, and interested in learning and mastering new technologies to overcome unique challenges.

1.title: Letter to the editor: Procedure for access to the ERS and ENVISAT missiondata through the ESA portal and the interactive tool EOLI-SA

description.1: Crafted a comprehensive microservice migration plan to dismantle a monolithic system, boosting reliability.
description.2: Optimized product search quality, accuracy, and response time by implementing Algolia as the search service.
description.3: Developed a collaborative filtering recommendation system, boosting sales and enhancing product visibility.

description.1: Created mission-critical React components for the new MVP site focused on accessibility and performance.
description.2: Established Azure Cognitive Search indexes, enhancing the precision of text-based queries.
description.3: Enhanced Microsoft MVP application performance by optimizing Entity Framework queries, minimizing database data retrieval and client-side data transmission for increased eficiency.

alphas.title: Senior Software Engineer → Lead Software Engineer

description.1: Accelerated data processing from minutes to seconds by optimizing distributed systems with RabbitMQ and MassTransit, enhancing operational eﬀiciency.
description.2: Refactored legacy systems into modern microservices using Azure technologies like App Service, Storage, Service Bus, Functions, CosmosDB, and Active Directory, boosting system performance by up to 40%.
description.3: Transferred an HTTP API from a VM to Azure App Service, cutting infrastructure costs by approximately 15%.

description.1: Implemented a WCF 3rd party service secured with an SSL certificate for compliance with a gov institution.
description.2: Improved Entity Framework performance by 30%. Removing unnecessary tracking on read-only queries.

description.1: Developed Node.js BFFs for web and mobile apps, customizing API clients to their specific requirements.
Achieved a 20% throughput improvement by migrating a backend API from .NET Framework to .NET Core 1.1.
